members.doc: do not wrap lines; just make the text area wider
members.name: none

members.doc: wrap text, breaking lines anywhere the cursor can appear (between characters, usually - if you want to be technical, between graphemes, see Pango.get_log_attrs)
members.name: char

members.doc: wrap text, breaking lines in between words
members.name: word

members.doc: wrap text, breaking lines in between words, or if that is not enough, also between graphemes
members.name: word_char
